original_text: Now when the Philistines heard that the people of Israel had gathered at Mizpah, the lords of the Philistines went up against Israel. And when the people of Israel heard of it, they were afraid of the Philistines.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 미스바에 모였다 함을 블레셋 사람들이 듣고 그들의 방백들이 이스라엘을 치러 올라온지라 이스라엘 자손들이 듣고 블레셋 사람들을 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: that the people of Israel had gathered at Mizpah
the lords of the Philistines went up against Israel.
And when the people of Israel heard of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성이 그 소식을 듣고

sentences.original_text: they were afraid of the Philistines.
